'''19w05a''' is the nineteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.14]], released on January 30, 2019,<ref>{{snap|19w05a|January 30, 2019}}</ref> which adds [[wandering trader]]s and [[trader llama]]s.

== Additions ==
=== Items===
'''[[Spawn egg]]s'''
* [[File:Wandering Trader Spawn Egg JE1.png|32px]] [[Wandering trader spawn egg]]
* [[File:Trader Llama Spawn Egg JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Trader llama spawn egg]]

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Brown Trader Llama.png|32px]] [[Trader llama]]s'''
* Are the same as normal [[llama]]s but have blue and gold decorations.
** Can be equipped with carpets as normal llamas. Original garb reappears when the carpet is taken off.
* Hostile towards all [[illager]]s (except for [[ravager]]s), [[zombie]]s, [[zombie pigmen]], [[zombie villager]]s, [[husk]]s, and [[drowned]].
* Separate entities from llamas.
* Temperamental around players.

'''[[File:Wandering Trader.png|32px]] [[Wandering trader]]s'''
* Found in random places around the world.
* Provides a random variety of biome-specific item trades.
** Trading times are limited, locked trades are not unlockable by conducting other trades.
** Has 6 trades, all unlocked up front, once used up cannot be reopened.
* Always surrounded by a few trader llamas.
* Separate entities from villagers.
* Only one exists per world and despawns after 48000 ticks (40 minutes).

=== Commands ===
* Two new block tags: <code>dragon_immune</code> and <code>wither_immune</code>.

=== General ===
'''[[Sound]]s'''
* Added new placing and breaking sounds for [[lantern]]s.
* New placement sounds for the [[sweet berry bush]].

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Composter]]s'''
* Changed how often the player fills a layer.
* Items which used to have a 10% chance now have a 30% chance; 20% changed to 50%; 50% changed to 65%; and 80% changed to 85%.

=== Items ===
'''[[Spawn egg]]s'''
* Renamed illager beast spawn egg to ravager spawn egg.
* Changed the ID of ravager spawn egg to <code>ravager_spawn_egg</code>.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Ravager]]s'''
* Renamed from "Illager Beast".
* ID changed to <code>ravager</code>.
* Now have their own sounds on the client side.

=== Commands ===
* {{cmd|forceload query}} can now be executed by command blocks and functions.
